[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [MapViewUtils](./harp-mapview.mapviewutils.md) &gt; [rotate](./harp-mapview.mapviewutils.rotate.md)

## MapViewUtils.rotate() function

Rotates the camera by the given delta yaw and delta pitch. The pitch will be clamped to the maximum possible tilt to the new target, and under the horizon in sphere projection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function rotate(mapView: MapView, deltaYawDeg: number, deltaPitchDeg?: number, maxTiltAngleRad?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | The \[\[MapView\]\] instance in use. |
|  deltaYawDeg | number | Delta yaw in degrees. |
|  deltaPitchDeg | number | Delta pitch in degrees. |
|  maxTiltAngleRad | number | Max tilt angle in radians. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
